name: NotesApp
description: NotesApp is a simple personal project that allows users to create, edit and delete notes. Data is stored in the browser's local storage.

name: MoveIt
description: Project to help students and developers to stay healthy. After each pomodoro cycle (set to 3s just for demonstration purposes) the user gets a light exercise to do, if the user completes it they get xp.

name: CodePartner
description: A website to find other developers created as a project to the Web Development I course. It features a basic login/registration process and it gets data from the gitHub API.

name: GitHub Clone
description: A simple UI clone developed to gain more experience with TypeScript and styled-components.
